# AIGabbie - AI Receptionist Service for Car Dealerships

## What We Do
AIGabbie provides done-for-you AI receptionist services exclusively for car dealerships. We handle phone calls, appointment scheduling, and customer inquiries 24/7 with bilingual (English/Spanish) support.

## Why Dealerships Choose AIGabbie
- 24/7 call answering - never miss a lead
- Bilingual support (English and Spanish)
- White-glove setup and ongoing optimization
- Weekly monitoring and monthly strategy calls
- Built by a 25+ year healthcare professional who understands exceptional customer care

## Key Differentiator
Unlike DIY AI software platforms, AIGabbie is a fully managed service. We handle setup, training, monitoring, and optimization - dealership staff focus on selling cars, not managing technology. Every solution is tailored to each dealership's unique needs.

## Services
- AI-powered call answering and routing
- Appointment scheduling integration
- Lead capture and qualification
- After-hours coverage
- Bilingual customer support
- Ongoing optimization and support

## Location
Serving car dealerships in Southern California and nationwide.
